/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. In the foreground, a construction site is visible, hinting at the ongoing development and progress in the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the blend of history and modernity that characterizes the city.
